Hideo Kojima's keynote address at the Game Developers Conference was an exciting and insightful presentation touching on his experience and thoughts about game development. Beginning with his early days at Konami, he spoke of his journey in the gaming industry and his views on the importance of creating memorable experiences for players that they'll take with them long after they've completed a game. He discussed the game design philosophy behind his latest project, Death Stranding, and how he aimed to create a new genre of gaming with a unique connection between players and the game's protagonist. Kojima also highlighted his passion for cinema and how it influenced his approach to game development. Ultimately, the takeaway from Kojima's keynote address was his emphasis on the crucial role of game creators in making games that deliver a profound and lasting impact on their audience.
